review: This Roku is really great.  Easily fits on the back of your TV without taking up any real estate at all. It works very smoothly and captures the WiFi signal from upstairs perfectly.  The remote control makes everything work easily and is a much better concept than the Google Chomecast solution.  I have the Google Chromecast which at first glance seems cool because it works with your Iphone or Ipad or Android.  But you quickly learn that is more of a hindrance than a blessing, because mobile devices turn off to save battery.  So a standard remote control like the one that comes with this Roku is a much better solution.On the Chromecast, half the time, there is a hicup in getting it to work correctly.  You are left to close apps, open apps, unplug the Chromecast, plug it back in and hope it finally connects.  But with the Roku, it has worked perfectly every time...never a hicup...never a frustrating moment.Plus the Roku has way more Channels than the competition.  So you get Amazon and Netflix, and HBO and PBS and a zillion other channels.  In comparison, Chromecast has very few channels.We hooked up our Roku on the back of the kitchen television set.  So space was a premium.  This Roku fit the bill.  Highly recommended.
